entry.dcterms:title: TÁRKI Omnibus 1999/8. Social-political attitudes in Hungary among the adult population.
entry.dcterms:creator: Zsadányi-Nagy, Csaba
entry.dcterms:subject: TÁRKI Joint Research Center TDATA-D48: TÁRKI Omnibus 1999/8. Social-political attitudes in Hungary among the adult population.. data sheet. Version: 2007-01-19

entry.dcterms:subject: 2004-03-00: the labels of the data file are corrected and complemented
entry.dcterms:description: 1. party preferences and political attitudes 2. tax-consciousness, opinions regarding tax-fraud, agreement with current government measures
entry.dcterms:subject: social behaviour and attitudes
elections
economic policy
mass political behavior, attitudes
political institutions, public administration
person
survey data
cross-section

A multi-stage proportionally stratified random probability sample representative of the Hungarian adult population. Unsuccessful inquiries were substituted with supplementary addresses, where persons to be interviewed were selected on the basis of the Leslie Kish key.
face-to-face interview
A
